p: The month-wise temperature distribution is shown in Fig. 2c. the average temperature from 2016–2019 was 28.5°C. The highest average temperature was seen in May (34.16 ± 5.62°C) and the lowest in December (24.24 ± 3.83°C). The month-wise prevalence of EKC was not correlated with the distribution of temperature (r = 0.2793), and this correlation was not statistically significant (r 2 = 0.08/ P = 0.3793).
